summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 8th Avenue North, from Harrison Street to Westlake Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9553 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
